constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 93 (Friday, May 27, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WASSERMAN SCHULTZ:
H.R. 7906.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 5 of Amendment XIV to the Constitution
[Page H5221]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: To establish a civil action for disqualification under section 3 of the 14th Amendment to the Constitution, and for other purposes.
